channel.title: Bawdry & Befuddling - Devoid of Joy (percussion slop)
channel.description:
Mainly a sloppy drum kits track. A lot of delays and automation across the board. A bit chaotic but I feel its decently controlled, I think 69bpm so its a prolly a little slow for some.
https://soundcloud.com/devoidofjoy/bawdry-befuddling?si=3f69c7e38237412da62fdb14930a483c
